detail: 蛋白质中的战斗机，作为动物蛋白脂肪含量低至2%，是健身餐的首选。
endetail: Most classic source of protein, has only 2% fat as an complete protein.

detail: 选用上等后臀牛柳，脂肪含量约4%，是牛肉中最低的。拥有大量优质蛋白质。
endetail: We choose beef center loin which as the lowest fat of 4%. Best beef protein source.

detail: 口感和味道相比鸡胸肉更好。去皮去骨的鸡腿肉脂肪含量在7%～8%之间。
endetail: 7-8% fat. We use boneless skinless chicken thigh to reduce fat contents. Juicier and tastier than breast meat.

detail: 营养密度相对较低，蛋白质密度比肉类较少，脂肪含量低至1%以下，味道鲜美。
endetail: Has low caloric density, and packed with high quality protein. Has less than 1% of fat content.

detail: 口感极佳。拥有优质蛋白质和Omega-3多不饱和脂肪酸，脂肪含量在4%左右。
endetail: High in protein and essential omega-3,6,9 fatty acids. 4% in fat content and very tasty.

detail: 拥有大量不饱和脂肪酸，DHA，EPA，优质蛋白质。脂肪含量12%，是最高级的营养来源。
endetail: Packed with omega 3,6,9 fatty acids, DHA, EPA, and high quality protein. Top grade fat source.

detail: 脂肪含量6%，拥有大量优质蛋白质以及骨胶原，对于保持骨骼/筋腱韧性有很大帮助。
endetail: Packed with omega 3,6,9 fatty acids, DHA, EPA, and high quality protein. Top grade fat source.

detail: 100%液体蛋清，所有热量都来自蛋白质。是补充高脂肪肉类餐品的好搭档。
endetail: 100% liquid egg whites, with 100% protein in nutrition content. Best match with high fat protein source.

detail: 厨用蛋白粉，是白面的替代品。用来烤松饼，马芬，饼干等零食。
endetail: Healthier substitute for flour. Mostly used in baking such as muffins and cookies.

detail: 脂肪含量只有猪肉培根五分之一，为8%。少量用在沙拉中，提高餐品味道。
endetail: Has only 1/5 of fat than regular bacon, 8%. Mostly used in salads for better tastes.

detail: 脂肪含量7%，比新鲜三文鱼少，蛋白含量较高。早餐三明治的首选。
endetail: 7% fat, which is less than fresh salmon, and richer in protein. First choice for sandwiches.

detail: 几乎所有热量都来自于蛋白质。口感稍干，配合脂肪较高的食材搭配出均衡的餐品。
endetail: We use tuna in water to reduce fat. A bit dry in taste, best match with in-gredients with high fat con-tent.

detail: 豆腐的再加工产品。号称田中的肉。雌激素较高，需要配合其他肉类弥补。
endetail: Classic plant protein. However it is relatively high in estrogen. Mostly used with other meat products.

detail: 蛋黄中拥有大量维生素，不饱和脂肪酸以及微量元素。与蛋清搭配，可以控制脂肪摄入。
endetail: Rich in essential fatty acids and protein. Best match with liquid egg whites.

detail: 口感极佳，味道鲜美。缺点是脂肪含量较多，在10%左右。蛋白密度在鸡胸肉之上。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 选用0%希腊酸奶。口感干涩。配合水果，蜂蜜等天然糖分，是很好的早餐餐品。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 选用5%超瘦牛肉馅。拥有大量蛋白质。易搭配，可以变化出很多口感和味道的食材。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 选用鸡胸绞肉，营养价值与鸡胸肉相同，是鸡胸肉的另一种变化。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 鸡胸肉再加工食品。口感味道好。钠元素稍多，配合钾元素高的食材可以相互弥补。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 属于低GI碳水化合物，在植物中蛋白质极高。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 白米的最佳替补。GI值为白米的一半，是搭配中式健身餐的最佳主食。
endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.

detail: 全麦制品，低GI,口感好，是百搭的西式主食。

endetail: Great in taste, howev-er little high in fat at 10%. Protein density is higher than breast meat.
